item.title: Using LLMs to Evaluate Youtube Videos
item.description: I often get recommended YouTube videos with catchy titles but not much substance. To save time, I built a simple app that downloads the transcript of the video, feeds it to ChatGPT, and generates a quick summary, key moments, and any fresh insights the video offers. After skimming this I can decide if the video is worth watching. It’s been a huge time-saver, so I’m sharing the code here, along with a quick overview of how it works.
